attributes.action: introduce legislation to make it illegal for any taxpayer or council taxpayer funded organisation (either nationally or locally) to settle any legal matter out of court using taxpayer contributions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are far too many cases arising where employees have abrogated their responsbilities to operate fairly and legally because they know the taxpayer will pick up the tab and will usually do so following an 'out of court settlement' which is then declared confidential and not in the public interest to divulge.  It is absolutely in the public interest for us ALL to know where out taxpayer pounds are going and out of court settlements using OUR money should be stopped immediately.
